Headline: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos
Article_Body: Villanova's Jermaine Samuels falls after he was fouled by Georgetown's Jagan Mosely during the second half of the game in Washington on March 7. Villanova won 70-69. Dogs run in the Open World Championship Sled Dog Races during the Fur Rendezvous on March 1 in Anchorage, Alaska. Mika Zibanejad, No. 93, and Tony DeAngelo, No. 77, of the New York Rangers celebrate Zibanejad's fifth goal of the game in overtime to defeat the Washington Capitals 5-4 at Madison Square Garden on March 5 in New York City. Meg Lanning celebrates victory with her teammates during the ICC Women's T20 Cricket World Cup Final match between India and Australia on March 8 in Melbourne. Aleksander Aamodt Kilde of Norway competes during the Audi FIS Alpine Ski World Cup Men's Alpine Combined on March 1 in Hinterstoder, Austria. Sumo wrestlers contest a bout at the Spring Grand Sumo Tournament at Edion Arena Osaka on March 8. It was the first time ever that a grand sumo tournament was held in the absence of spectators, due to the ongoing coronavirus outbreak.  Sri Lanka's team captain Lasith Malinga catches a ball during a practice session at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Kandy, Sri Lanka on March 3. Alex Bowman, driver of the No. 88 Cincinnati Chevrolet, pits during the NASCAR Cup Series Auto Club 400 on March 1 in Fontana, California. UFC women's strawweight champion Weili Zhang, left, takes a punch from former champion Joanna Jedrzejczyk during UFC 248 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas on March 7. Milwaukee Brewers' Jace Peterson tries to catch a ball during the first inning of a spring training baseball game against the Cincinnati Reds on March 1 in Phoenix. Cassius Stanley of the Duke Blue Devils dunks against the North Carolina State Wolfpack during their game on March 2 in Durham, North Carolina. Duke won 88-69. Giorgia Villa of Italy performs on the bars during the America Cup gymnastics competition March 7, in Milwaukee.  Edmonton Oilers' Tyler Ennis reaches for the puck as Nashville Predators goaltender Pekka Rinne blocks a shot in the first period of an NHL hockey game March 2 in Nashville. Norway's Aleksander Aamodt Kilde speeds down the course during training for the men's World Cup downhill in Kvitfjell, Norway, March 6. Australia's Sophie Molineux celebrates victory after their ICC Women's T20 Cricket World Cup Final match against India on March 8, in Melbourne. Players compete for the ball in a lineout during the round six Super Rugby match between the Sunwolves and the Brumbies on March 6 in Wollongong, Australia. David Terans of Peñarol and Thiago Heleno of Athletico PR fight for the ball during a match on March 3 in Curitiba, Brazil. People sit in the stands of Anfield stadium in Liverpool, England before the start of the English Premier League soccer match between Liverpool and Bournemouth on March 7. Jae'Sean Tate of the Sydney Kings shoots during Game 2 of the NBL Semi Final Series against Melbourne United on March 2 in Melbourne, Australia. Madisyn Cox competes in the Women's 400m IM Final on Day 3 of the TYR Pro Swim Series in Des Moines, Iowa on March 6. Robbie Robinson of Inter Miami and Steve Birnbaum of D.C. United battle for a loose ball during a match on March 7 in Washington, DC. New York Islanders' Johnny Boychuk takes a skate to the face during the third period of an NHL hockey game on March 3, in New York. Norway's Johannes Thingnes Boe competes in the men's Biathlon World Cup 10 km sprint event in Nove Mesto na Morave, Czech Republic on March 6. Milwaukee Bucks forward Giannis Antetokounmpo goes up for a shot against Miami Heat forward Jimmy Butler in the first quarter in Miami on March 2. Frankie Dettori riding Cemhaan leads the pack at The 32Red Casino Novice Stakes at Kempton Park Racecourse on March 4 in Sunbury, England. Francesco Friedrich, Candy Bauer, Martin Grothkopp and Alexander Schueller of Germany compete during the final heat for the Men's Bobsleigh at the BMW IBSF World Championships Altenberg 2020 on March 1 in Altenberg, Germany. Aleksandr Selevko of Estonia performs in the Gala Exhibition at the ISU World Junior Figure Skating Championships on March 8 in Tallinn, Estonia.  Australia Rebels player Matt Philip attempts to break through the South Africa Lions defense during the Super Rugby match in Melbourne on March 7. Utah State Aggies head coach Craig Smith throws the net to his players after defeating the San Diego State Aztecs in the Mountain West Conference tournament final in Las Vegas on March 7. See 26 amazing photos from last week.
